articles.title: European stocks hit six-month high after Fed hints at smaller rate hikes - CNBC
articles.description: European markets mostly rose Thursday after U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said smaller interest rate hikes could begin soon.

articles.title: Europe's first Mars rover Rosalind Franklin now set to launch in 2028 - SiliconRepublic.com
articles.description: Months after the ESA severed ties with Roscosmos, member states have invested €360m to ensure the Rosalind Franklin rover lands on Mars.
articles.content:
Months after the ESA severed ties with Roscosmos, putting the fate of the mission up in the air, a 360m investment will help ensure the rover lands on Mars.

articles.title: Coffee pods and tea bags targeted in bid to reduce Europe's 'growing mountain of waste' - The Irish Times
articles.description: EU wants products to be industrially compostable as Europe struggles with rising volumes of rubbish
articles.content:
